replies.body: I'm in the same issue dude. Switched regions, was stuck on OC region for an hour trying to download, reinstalled league completely and now getting RADS error. NOTHING IS WORKING.

> [{quoted}](name=Fae,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8yFbvgLu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-18T18:42:45.908+0000)
>
> I'm in the same issue dude. Switched regions, was stuck on OC region for an hour trying to download, reinstalled league completely and now getting RADS error. NOTHING IS WORKING.

Literally the exact same thing. After it wouldn't download on OC I figured I'd just reinstall it to be less of a hassle and its turned into this giant mess. Every solution I've tried has failed.
its just so fucked up now i cant reach my challanges for this sick event and i bet we wont get anything back from riot for us having no chance to win the challanges

Typically that RADS error is a sign that your OS is blocking League from opening. When you redownloaded the client, your OS possibly lost its permissions for League. Go through and update your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if you still can't get back on the Rift.
